Method Detail

checkIsFulfilledProbabilityRestriction

public boolean checkIsFulfilledProbabilityRestriction(NonTerminal nt)
Description copied from interface: StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Checks that the sum of the probabilities of the Productions that have at the left side the symbol nt, sum 1. Return TRUE if the restriction is fulfilled, FALSE otherwise.

Specified by:
checkIsFulfilledProbabilityRestriction in interface StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Parameters:
nt - The NonTerminal to be checked.

checkIsFulfilledProbabilityRestriction

public boolean checkIsFulfilledProbabilityRestriction()
Description copied from interface: StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Checks that the sum of the probabilities of the Productions that have at the left side the same NonTerminal symbol, sum 1. Return TRUE if the restriction is fulfilled in the Grammar, FALSE otherwise. In the case that it returns FALSE generates a log with the NonTerminal symbols that doesn´t fulfill the restriction.

Specified by:
checkIsFulfilledProbabilityRestriction in interface StochasticContextFreeGrammar

getProbability

public double getProbability(Production p)
Description copied from interface: StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Get the probability associated to the Production p. Returns a negative value if the Production doesn´t has associated a proabbility value.

Specified by:
getProbability in interface StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Parameters:
p - The Production that is necessary to know its probability associated.

getProduction

public Production getProduction(NonTerminal nt)
Description copied from interface: StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Return a Production object that has the NonTerminal symbol nt at the left side. The Production object is randomly selected with the probabilities associated to the Productions.

Specified by:
getProduction in interface StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Parameters:
nt - The NonTerminal that filters the production to be selected.

setProbability

public double setProbability(Production p,
                             double pr)
                      throws GrammarExceptionImpl
Description copied from interface: StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Set the probability associated to the Production p. The probability play a role in the selection of the Prodution in a Derivation. The sum of all the probabilities of the Productions that have the same left side symbol must be 1. The method returns a negative if the ID of p doesn´t collide with other ID. If there is a collision, then the new probability replace the old_probability, and the method returns the old_probability of the Production that collides. Throws a GrammarExceptionImpl if the Production is NULL.

Specified by:
setProbability in interface StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Parameters:
p - The Production that will have asociated the probability pr.
pr - The probability to be asociated to the Production p.
Throws:
GrammarExceptionImpl

getType

public boolean getType()
Description copied from interface: StochasticContextFreeGrammar
Returns TRUE is the Grammar is a true stochastic Grammar, and FALSE if is a standard Context Free Grammar.

Specified by:
getType in interface StochasticContextFreeGrammar

Description copied from interface: StochasticContextFreeGrammar
